transcript:
Customer: Hello
Helllo
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan govind ji se baat ho rahi hai swastik healthcare mein?
Executive: Haan bol raha hu aap kaun bol rahe hain?
Executive: Ji good morning sir main Aasim Khan bol raha tha Indiamart.com se manager aapki company registered hai Indiamart ke sath mein.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapka jo account dekhte hain na Vishal ji main unka manager baat kar raha tha aapki services ke regarding maine sir aapko call kiya tha sir. To yahan main dekh raha tha sir aapka na ek complaint aaya hua tha by leads ko lekar unhone mujhe bataya bhi tha ki sir aap ek bar dekh lo sir ko kuch issue aa raha hai. Leads nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: [inaudible] matlab lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha to sir ye jaise jo aapne kuch by lead consume kari hai is month mein jaise dekh raha hu to ye hamare product se related nahi hai sir jaise aapne kareeb nine by lead consume kari hai sir.
Customer: Majboori mein karni padti hai kyunki ye jo lead hai na agar ye chhod dunga to dobara milegi nahi mujhe to kya karunga main.
Executive: Bilkul sir.
Customer: Aapke sir jo product hai wo yahi hai na jo aapne dal rakhe hain herbal sexual wellness product wagera se related kya?
Customer: Yahi hai ji haan jo dal rakhe hain bas yahi hai.
Executive: To sir jaise maine abhi check kara ek herbal sexual health power capsule ka mere pass ek lead aaya hua tha Firozabad ka aapne check kara?
Customer: Haan wo chahiye hi nahi mere ko.
Executive: Aapko nahi chahiye kyun?
Customer: Nahi herbal nahi chahiye hivaare chahiye.
Executive: Kaun sa?
Customer: Hivaare.
Executive: Kyun hivaare?
Customer: Kyunki hivaare deal mere pass hai hi nahi to bechunga kya batao main.
Executive: [inaudible] aap deal nahi karte isme sir.
Customer: Bhai ek baat bataiye jo cheez mere pass hai hi nahi usko bechunga kya? 
Executive: Sir to main wahi to puch raha hu aap se sir ye jaise jo aapne dal rakha hai herbal sexual health power capsule ye relevent aapke liye.
Customer: Hivaare hai hivaare.
Executive: Hivaare aur herbal mein kya difference hota hai sir?
Customer: Ya company alag hai.
Executive: Sir hivaare to ek brand hai na ab ye bol raha hu na.
Customer: Haan to samne wala nahi mangta jab main kehta hu na is baat ko jab main grahak ko samjhata hu na.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi main aapki baat ko samajh gaya. Sir main aapki baat ko samajh gaya jaise man lo herbal mein 10 man lo herbal mein 10 product hai jaise man lo patanjali bhi hai ya hamdard bhi hai ya fir man lo kya kehte hain wo bhi hai kya kehte hain wo jo bahut sare kya kehte hain Rex remedies bhi hai ya man lo kya kehte hain aapka wala item bhi hai ya aur bhi aneke logo ke brand hai aapka jo hivaare hai wo brand hai na sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap hivaare brand ka bechte ho na sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To sir brand ka to sir aise to hivaare to sir koi naam itna bada brand hai nahi ki jisko har koi janta hoga kyunki brand to hum log kabhi promote karte nahi hai sir. Itna nahi hai wo jante log usko.
Customer: Aap nahi jante kaam nahi hai jante log usko.
Executive: Sir dekho main aapko main aapki baat ko samajh gaya main ek cheez aapko clear kar du sir Indiamart kabhi bhi brand ko promote nahi karti hai aap agar ye soche aapko particular brand ki inquiry milegi agar brand ka naam dalega buyer man lo main ek buyer hu main search karta hu hivaare sexual health power capsule to wo definitely dikhega lekin agar buyer ne wahan brand ka naam nahi dala hai to wo nahi dikhega waha pe kyunki hum log kabhi bhi brand promote nahi karte sir.
Customer: Main kya karu?
Executive: Sir hum log brand promote sir hum brand promote karte hi nahi hai sir.
Customer: Jab aapka samjh mein aayegi main batao mere ko wo cheez main samjhaunga aapko.
Executive: Aise samajh mein aise to sir market mein dasio hazar brand hai sir to hum kya har brand ki inquiry banayenge sir aap mujhe bataiye sir.
Customer: Jab ek baat batao jaise aap jab mere ko samjha rahe ho na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello. Jo aap mere ko ek baat jab main grahak ko samjhata hu na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Yahi baat jab main grahak ko samjhata hu to grahak samne wala mana kar deta hai bole pagal samjha hai kya humko grahak ye kehta hai.
Executive: Sir sir grahak sare log ek jaise mana nahi karenge agar aap kabhi kabhi medical pe bhi jate hoge medical.
Customer: 99% suno 99% mana karte hain main recording bhej chuka hu Vishal ko bhi aur Vishal se pehle jitne manager the na mere pass pichle saal ke unko sabko recording bhej di maine.
Executive: To sir main agar aapko ek cheez clear kar du sir agar aap ye soch rahe hain hum log brand ko promote nahi karte sir agar aap particular brand ki aap bologe.
Customer: Ek baat aur suniye.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Pehli saal mein pichli saal thi uske baad dobara maine isko matlab plan ko renew karwaya hi nahi tha fir mere pass kisi ka Anivesh ka phone aaya tha usne kaha tha bole renew kara lo ye hai wo hai to maine ek hi shart pe ek hi condition pe renew karaunga mujhe product ke naam se lead chahiye agar aap de sakte ho to renew karao nahi to nahi karao.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap Anivesh se baat kar lijiye direct. Main pehle main Anivesh se baat kar leta hu agar aapko nahi nahi nahi aap sir main unse agar aapko lag raha hai main unse baat kar leta hu agar aapko aisa lag raha hai aur aapki baat bhi karwa deta hu lekin agar aap ye soche ki aapko sirf particular brand ki by lead hum de de to wo possible nahi hai kyunki Indiamart kabhi bhi brand promote nahi karta aapke.
Customer: Ek baat suno sirf meri baat suno.
Executive: Sir aise market mein to sir aise to market mein sir nahi nahi nahi aise to sir market mein 10000 product hai 10000 brand hum promote karenge kya?
Customer: Ek baat batao confirm karke aaya hu.
Executive: Aapko.
Customer: Agar aap mere se santusht hai to baat kariye nahi to phone rakh dijiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi main santushti ki baat nahi kar raha hu main aapki baat ko samajh raha hu aap jo bol rahe hain main aapki aapki jo complaint aap bol rahe hain main us lead kar deta hu jisne aapka paisa uthaya aap unse ek bar baat kar lijiyega sir.
Customer: Unhi se baat kariye maine to ye to aur pehle confirm karke aaya hu main mujhe by product by lead chahiye maine ki to andar aao nahi to nahi aao sir ne kaha aapko product by lead denge hum.
Customer: Tab maine paisa diya tab jaake andar aaya nahi mera kaam hi nahi tha andar aane ka.
Executive: Sir main mafi chahunga sir main aapko nahi main sir main samjha nahi raha hu main aapko clarification de raha hu aapko main samjha nahi raha hu main aapko clarification de raha hu.
Customer: Mujhe suno mujhe mujhe clarification aap kya doge main pehle clarification kar kar ke aaya hu andar hi mujhe main.
Executive: To sir main aapke unse nahi nahi main unse aapki to fir main aisa karta hu sir main aapki unse baat karwa deta hu unke manager se bhi baat karwa deta hu aap ek bar isko issue ko resolve kar dijiye fir aage ka isko continue karte hain sir. Avinash ji se aapki baat hui thi na Avinash Sharma.
Customer: Baat samajh mein nahi aati main phone rakh raha hu mere ko samajh mein nahi aata.
Executive: Main Avinash nahi nahi Avinash Jamwal ji se main aapki baat karwa deta hu sir koi dikkat wali baat thodi na hai.
Customer: Kaun Jama ji?
Executive: Jinhone aap se paisa liya hai na bhavna ne aur Avinash ne main unse aapki baat karwa deta hu wo aapko clarification pura bata denge hum log bina faltu mein iske piche.
Executive: To fir sir hum log iske piche behas.
Customer: Aapne kisko through payment kari thi sir aapne Avinash ko paisa diya tha na?
Executive: Behas kaun kar raha hai? Behas kaun kar raha hai? Kaun aapne kiya ki maine kiya behas kaun kar raha hai batao chalo.
Executive: Sir main behas nahi kar raha hu main clarification aapko bata raha hu ki sir agar aap ye.
Executive: Sir aap mere client ho main aap se behas kyun karunga aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: To fir jab ek baat batao samne wala mere se kahega ki mujhe to shakkar chahiye aur main main usko gyan dunga ki nahi bhai shakkar mat kha tu gud kha gud bhi meetha hi hota hai to samne wala.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi main shakkar nahi to shakkar agar nahi nahi nahi agar client sir ye bolega mere ko shakkar sirf fortune ki chahiye to main usko ye bolunga fortune ki shakkar nahi hai hamare pass is wale brand ki shakkar hai main ye nahi bol raha aapko shakkar ki aap gud do usko sir.
Customer: Gud gud ki baat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir gud ki kahan aa rahi hai man lo main aapke pass sir main nahi nahi aapka meri baat suno meri baat suno aapka medical hai main aapke pass aaya maine bola mere ko yaani ki ek paracetamol chahiye kya kehte hain sipla ki aapne bola paracetamol sipla ki nahi hai mere pass dusri company ki hai agar mujhe lagega main aap se lunga sir kyun nahi lunga main ye thoda bol raha aap ye thoda bologe ke paracetamol nahi hai iske badle procin le lo aap mere se.
Customer: Total farji lead aati hai main recording bhej chuka hu. Vishal ko bhej di.
Customer: Vishal ne mujhe diya tha ki 3000 din pehle ki baat hai bole yaar aap bata rahe ho lead nahi aati lead nahi aati ye lead hai main dekh ye lead farji hai main ki main bata raha hu tere ko nahi nahi lead hai main consume karke bata raha hu main consume karke usko recording bhej di dekhna pehle ye farji hai ki asli hai.
Executive: Sir har nahi nahi nahi har lead sir farji nahi hoti hai aap service ko use karenge buyer se baat karenge.
Customer: 100% pichle saal se lagatar ek kehte kehte 100% farji.
Customer: Aur yahan tak kaha tha maine Indiamart apna ye application ko sudhar le nahi to ye grahak jayenge dheere dheere karke.
Executive: Kya application mein sir galti hai kya application mein problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Dekho main phone rakh raha hu mere ko faltu behas nahi karni seedhi si baat hai aapko jisse baat karni.
Executive: Sir main aapki main faltu disturb main sir aapki main aapki sirf problem ko resolve karne ke liye hi maine aapko call kiya baki main aapki jo complaint solution hoga hi nahi.
Executive: To fir sir fir dusra agar aap discuss nahi karoge maine to bakayda screenshot karke bheja hai ki nahi nahi sir dekho.
Executive: Sir by leads agar aap ye bologe main aapko hivaare brand ki du to wo mafi chahunga sir wo possible nahi hai.
Customer: Thoda meri baat suno meri baat suno mere account pe clear likha hua aa raha hai no no lead available.
Executive: Sir aap location to change karo na aap location to change karo ek bar India ko click to karo sir aap.
Customer: Kya videsh ki location dalu kya main?
Executive: Aap mere ko bhejo sir aap India ka location ka filter laga ke.
Executive: Sir India ke upar check mere pass. Are sir aap sir aap agar kabhi check karoge us time available nahi hai aadhe ghante ke baad check karo sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting product-specific buyleads.

- Feels Indiamart is not promoting specific brands.

- Claims most leads are irrelevant and fake.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified Indiamart doesn't promote specific brands.

- Offered to connect customer with previous executive.

- Suggested customer to change location settings.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect customer with previous executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, brand promotion, location settings, complaints
